# PerfactWorks Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Premium technology consultancy website for PerfactWorks - "Engineering Perfection in Every Solution."

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- React 18
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion for animations

## Design System
- Dark-first design with light mode toggle
- Blue-purple gradient color scheme
- Glassmorphism effects
- Modern typography with perfect spacing
- Smooth animations and micro-interactions

## Development Guidelines
- Component-based architecture
- Mobile-first, fully responsive
- SEO optimized
- Accessibility compliant (WCAG)
- Clean, documented, production-ready code
